targets.query:
from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -3d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power")
  |> sample(n: 10, pos: 1)

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._inverter == "site")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site" )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "site", _value:
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb71" )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb71", _value: 
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb72" )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb72", _value: 
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb51" )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb51", _value: 
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

import "experimental"
import "date"

local_time = experimental.addDuration(d: -5h, to: now())

midnight = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == date.monthDay(t: local_time) )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "midnight")
  
right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_day = union(tables: [midnight, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total_wh"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_day")

import "experimental"
import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = 15d

// Extract the current months of production
first_of_month = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -32d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1 )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "first_of_month")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_month = union(tables: [first_of_month, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: experimental.addDuration(d: 1h, to: r._time), _value: float(v: r._total) / 1000.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_month")

import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = 15d

// Extract the current months of production
first_of_year = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -370d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1 and date.month(t: r._time) == 1 )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "first_of_year")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_year = union(tables: [first_of_year, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total_wh"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _mwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.000001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_year")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter== "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _mwh: float(v: r._value) * 0.000001 }))

days_to_visualize = -5d     // Visualize the last 5 days of site total production

// Collect the site total production data
from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: days_to_visualize)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 3600.0 / float(v: r.elapsed) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["elapsed", "_start", "_stop", "_field", "_inverter", "_measurement"])
  |> yield(name: "production")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -30m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field== "elevation")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "sun_elevation")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -30m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field== "azimuth")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "sun_azimuth")

import "experimental"
import "date"

local_time = experimental.subDuration(d: 5h, from: now())

midnight = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == date.monthDay(t: local_time) )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "midnight")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_day = union(tables: [midnight, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total_wh"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: experimental.addDuration(d: 1h, to: r._time), _kgco2e: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.001 * 0.18991 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_day")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter== "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 0.001 * 0.18991 * 0.001 }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "operating_status" and r._inverter == "sb71")
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb71", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "operating_status" and r._inverter == "sb72")
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb72", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "operating_status" and r._inverter == "sb51")
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb51", _value: r._value }))

import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = -7d

// Extract the last 12 months of production
past_12 = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -13mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._value) / -1000.0 }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: timeAxisShift, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "past_12")

import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = -7d

// Extract the current months of production
first_of_month = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -32d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1 )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "first_of_month")

today = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "today")

this_month = union(tables: [first_of_month, today])
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) / -1000.0 }))
  |> timeShift(duration: timeAxisShift, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "this_month")

import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels

past_30 = from(bucket: "multisma2")

import "experimental"
import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = -6h

local_time = experimental.addDuration(d: -5h, to: now())

midnight = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == date.monthDay(t: local_time))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "midnight")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_day = union(tables: [midnight, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * -0.001 }))
  |> timeShift(duration: timeAxisShift, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "this_day")
